name: Solar System (itch) (tigirillos123)
description:
This is my Solar System Project, I added the following Elements

  1. Mercury: with Texture, Material, Scripts, and sound (Drone dark and scary)
  2. Venus: with Texture, Material, Scripts, and sound (Drone dark and scary) 
  3. Mars: with Texture, Material, Scripts, and sound (Drone dark and scary)
  4. Jupiter: with Texture, Material,  Scripts, and sound (Drone dark and scary)
  5. Created a Second Comet Spawner
  6. Adjusted the lighting
  7. Adjusted the angle and height of both Main and Mini camera

(sound works in downloads, not working on itch at the moment)
